title: Walker and Ritter are Moving Up
description:
Laura, Dan, Mina, Marcus, Adam, and Todd explain what they are most excited for in next weeks NFL Draft, why Desmon Ritter and Travon Walker are shooting up draft boards and the debate between drafting a wide receiver over trading for veteran. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
